It comprises a living room with a pullout couch (double bed), a dining room, a bedroom with a king-size bed, and a bathroom with a nice-sized shower. The kitchen includes a washer/dryer, a dishwasher and a combined microwave/convection oven.

We own California Wine Denmark, and upon arrival you will find

Gue

The apartment is 110 m2 and is located on the 5th floor of the rear building, so it is very quiet

The apartment sits right next to the local foodie gem, Torvehall

The space

In the 'hallway' there is a washing machine. In addition, we have a private terrace with gas grill and dining table where you can sit outside if the weather permits.

Also you will not find a lot of maschinery or gadgets here. Dishwashing is by hand and everything is manual.

But the WiFi is strong!

And its cozy, quiet, with good natural light and a nice view to the yard.

Guest access

Other things to note
Be aware, that the bed is a small double-bed (120x200). Fine for lover

There are four bedrooms in the apartment. Tree bedrooms with doublebeds, and a kids room with a single bed. On top of that mattresses are possible for additional guests.

Guest access
The apartment is located in the courtyard away from the busy street.
From the living room there is access to the cozy back yard.

name: The Brewer Apartments C - IntoThisPlace
description:
This cute place gives you the best of two worlds. The vibrancy of the historic city center plus the privacy of staying in a quiet courtyard building.

The apartment is renovated in 2018 with lovely decor blending modern Nordic design with an air of old innercity charm

For singles, couples or perhaps a small family, this is a great place to stay and to experience a slice of Danish ?hygge?.

The space
Despite being one of our smallest properties, this apartment still has you covered on everything you could possibly need during your visit to Copenhagen. Located on the second floor of a charming old building we call the apartment The Brewer inspired by Phillip Heymann, the co-founder of the Tuborg Brewery who used to live on this address.

A tour of the place
You enter directly into the open kitchen, dining and living area. A row of windows opens up the space nicely. There?s a modern kitchen, fully equipped with all your cooking ess

name: Family & Friends
description:
Great apartment on 2'th floor & No elevator.

This great 3 bedroom flat , With 130 Square meters of flexible beautiful living space, this apartment has it all: Equipped kitchen with a gas stove and dish washer, bathroom, 2 separate double bedrooms.
A spacious dining room for 6 people and a cozy living room with a big sofa and a big flat screen TV with free Netflix. Rooms are overlooking the cozy square.

name: Luxurious & Cozy Scandi-penthouse in central Cph
description:
One of the loveliest penthouses that the city has to offer - a perfect base for your Copenhagen adventure. My place is ideal for couples, business travellers or even solo adventurers. Located on one of the trendiest streets in Copenhagen, a short walk away from famous Nyhavn and all of the city's attractions. Restaurants, hip cafes and bars just outside.

Look forward to hosting you in Copenhagen!

name: Lovely and Homey Flat in a Great Neighborhood!
description:
My charming apartment is located very near the Centre of Copenhagen and Copenhagen Cathedral. Perfect place for a family or group, as it is surrounded by different Restaurants, caf‚, shops, bars. A enjoyable and homey place.

The space
A fantastic homey apartment on the ground level of the building. Located on the south side street of Church of Our Lady. You will be close to mostly everything, as this apartment is perfect for a visit in Copenhagen.

This 1 bedroom apartment offers more of homey living space. A living room that has a sofa bed and a sofa and a floor mattress that would cater all guests. The apartment is equipped with amenities such as Iron, Hairdryer.

Located 900m away from Kongens Nytorv (Centre of the City), the apartment is located very near of most highly visited places in Copenhagen, like Tivoli gardens, National Museum of Denmark, Copenhagen Cathedral, Str?get & K?bmagergade (Main shopping street), National Gallery of Denm

name: Charming place in the Latin Quarter
description:
Cozy apartment situated in the heart of the old city centre. The Latin Quarter of Copenhagen covers some of the city?s most vibrant streets and colourful places with interesting stores as well as wonderful restaurants and cafes to show for itself.
Restaurants, bars and Cafes right at your doorstep. :)

Other things to note
Please note the following before booking our apartment:
- our charming building comes with narrow stairs and it might be difficult to carry heavy luggages up
- we do not have any laundry facilities in the apartment.
- There is a brand new hot plate but no oven. Hope that will not be an inconvenience

name: Historical Apartment Downtown Copenhagen
description:
Situated in the heart of downtown on one of the most alternative streets in the Copenhagen. My place is ideal for traveling couples that want to experience the city from a unique perspective.

We're happy to host you in our beautiful city!

Other things to note
Please note the following before booking our apartment:
- our charming building comes with narrow stairs and it might be difficult to carry heavy luggages up
- we do not have any laundry facilities in the apartment.
- There is a brand new hot plate but no oven. Hope that will not be an inconvenience

name: Great Danish Apartment in quirky Latin Quarter
description:
Cozy & minimal, in the absolute city centre. Within walking distance of all major touristic attractions, my place is perfect for 2-3 travellers that want to experience Copenhagen at its best.

We're excited to be hosting you!

Other things to note
Please note the following before booking our apartment:
- our charming building comes with narrow stairs and it might be difficult to carry heavy luggages up
- we do not have any laundry facilities in the apartment.
- There is a brand new hot plate but no oven. Hope that will not be an inconvenience

name: Cozy Loft in the City Centre
description:
Attic style apartment perfectly suited for a couple. You are situated in one of the most central areas in Copenhagen in famous Latin Quarter. Plenty of restaurants, bars and Cafes at your doorstep.

We're excited to be hosting you!

Other things to note
Please note the following before booking our apartment:
- our charming building comes with narrow stairs and it might be difficult to carry heavy luggages up
- we do not have any laundry facilities in the apartment.
- There is a brand new hot plate but no oven. Hope that will not be an inconvenience

name: Springeven - Jumping Friend
description:
Are you interested in sharing with me my beautiful 50 feet sailingboat. It has a livingroom/kitchen, three cabins and a baathroom. Until May 2018 I will be in my hometown of Copenhagen. The space here is limited, so we will have to live close together. Besides it takes a while to get used to all the specialities related to living on a boat. Thus I would prefer an long term arrangement - maybe over the winter. For the months of February and March I am going abroad and you will be on your own.

The space
The boat is old, but of high quality and newly renovated.

Guest access
Living on a boat implies using the facities of the harbor besides those on the boat. These are good with bathrooms, washing/drying facilies and a restaurent. But the water supply on the bridges with the boats will closed in the coldest period.

Other things to note
Having two living here could also be a possibility.

name: Central & quiet
description:
In the middle of centre and yet quiet, no traffic street. Double ( Queen size ) bed in a private room. Two bathrooms. Two terraces . Modern, light and warm apt. on the 2nd floor + elevator.
Underground garage is also an option ; cheaper than parking in the street (on previous request though ; 10?/day, paid cash when you park the car).

The space
Double ( Queen size ) bed, private room with a direct acces to one of our terraces. A bathroom with heated floor, a shower cabin, toilet, washing machine and a dryer. Spacious kitchen in case if you need to keep something in the fridge or prepare coffee/tea. TV in your room. High speed Wi-Fi.
Our apt is in a modern building that's why well isolated and warm. Walking distance to the Town Hall Square and all the attractions the city can offer ( 5-6 min ) and the easiest accessibility to the airport, only 15 min from here by train.
Private parking in underground locked garage optional (on previous reque

name: Charmerende loftslejlighed i hjertet af K?benhavn
description:

Eller forestiller du dig en tur med din familie, hvor I har en lille lejlighed helt for jer selv? Eller er du bare en person, der elsker en fed beliggenhed og en sand f?lelse af den by du bes?ger? name: A perfect location in Copenhagen Inner City
description: A perfect location for a nice holiday in Copenhagen inner city heart. Nice, clean and quiet place close to all the central attractions. 5 min walk to Metro station, Nyhavn, Royal Theater and central shopping street etc.

name: The Brewer Apartments D - IntoThisPlace
description:
This designer loft gives you the vibrancy of downtown Copenhagen while letting you enjoy the privacy of staying in a quiet courtyard building.

The apartment is newly renovated with a modern designer feel that blends Nordic design with an air of old town charm.

If location and charm is important to you, this is a great rental for singles on business travels or for a romantic break with your chosen one. There is a possibility for a third guest to sleep on a fold-out couch.

The space
Discover a different and more personal side of Copenhagen in this newly-renovated designer loft situated on the second floor of an old townhouse.

A tour of the place
You enter the building from a private courtyard. From the front door, you enter into an open kitchen, dining and living area. The full kitchen has a stove, oven, refrigerator and all the utilities you need for preparing your own meals during your stay. Here, you will also find a dining

name: Rare Designer Townhouse in the Centre of Copenhagen
description: Walk to anywhere in Copenhagen from this unique renovated central townhouse. Stride across bleached timber floors that unite rooms with meticulously selected furnishings. The result is an inviting and inspiring interior in contemporary Scandinavian style created by the designer of the new luxury Hotel Sanders.

name: Exclusive and central - Private roof top terrace!
description:
This unique Scandinavian apartment is located in the City centre of Copenhagen with fast and easy access from the Airport. With only 21 mins on the Metro to the apartment, you will step out the door and find yourself within steps of the best the city has to offer; Nyhavn, Stroeget, Tivoli Gardens, Rosenborg Castle, Rundetaarn and much more. Suited to professionals, families or couples. Welcome!

The space
On the first level the apartment has two spacious bedrooms and both of them have a double bed inside and all beds are 180 cm wide.

Also, on this level there is a dining room/ office space , kitchen and bathroom. You have access to a private roof terrace accessed via the kitchen and bedroom.

On the second level of the home is a magnificent large lounge area with windows on both sides letting in lots of light. A perfect place to relax after a day seeing the city sites.

Guest access
The entire place will be private for y

name: Central beliggenhed i rolige og gr?nne omgivelser
description:
Velkommen p† Ole Suhrs Gade! Centralt beliggende med altan i rolig atmosf‘re og med gr?nne omgivelser.
Stor og rummelig lejlighed, moderne indrettet med respekt for oprindelige arkitektur.
K?kkenalrummet er hjertet i lejligheden - som forbinder lejlighedens stue, altan og sovev‘relse.

The space
Ved bordet i k?kkenalrummet kan der sidde op til 6 personer. K?kkenet indeholder alt moderne k?kkengrej, basisvarer osv. I sovev‘relset er der TV og b?rnev‘relset har tremmeseng. Der er mulighed for 2 sovepladser i den store stue i form af 2 madrasser. Man kan slappe af i den store gr† sofa i stuen med TV. Det rummelige badev‘relse rummer foruden brus og s† vaskemaskine og t?rretumbler samt t?rrestativ.

name: Beautiful family apartment
description: Beautiful family apartment at inner ?sterbro in Copenhagen. Architects' own home. Quiet and central location near the city's lakes in Victor Borge's childhood building. Bright, newly renovated and large 157sqm (ca. 1700 sqft) apartment.

name: Canal side 2 bedroom apartment
description: Enjoy the genuine Copenhagen atmosphere of Christianshavn. Comfortable apartment in a great location overlooking the canals. Spacious and cosy with 3 balconies. Good shops and great cafes nearby - and its just short walk over the bridge to all the inner city attractions. 5 minutes to the Metro station on the airport line.

name: ROOFTOP-APARTMENT IN THE CENTER OF COPENHAGEN!
description:
We are renting out our real estate-paradise in inner Copenhagen just by "The Lakes". This is the perfect location for exploring the city, close to train- and metrostation, and walking distance to Food Market, Str?get and Tivoli! The rooftop-apartment has a large kitchen-dining area, and a comfortable big couch for relaxing in front of the 50inches SmartTV. This area leeds up to the terrasse, which is perfect for an afternoon drink.

The space
The apartment is equipped with a great size bathroom and a lovely shower. Here you will also have access to washer and dryer. Last but not least, there is one big bedroom with a new double-sized bed.

Other things to note
It is decorated with danish design; light and with a Scandinavian touch.

name: Classy Elegant Apartment in the city center - Private roof top terrace!
description:
Beautiful, bright and spacious apartment right in the heart of Copenhagen. Close to the City Centre and just across ?rstedsparken a perfect place to sit down and chill. There are busses nearby and the central station is just a short walk away.
A perfect place to stay in the city.

The space
Perfectly cozy apartment for two. This apartment is the perfect place for Couple / Friends, it has a Double Size bed and a sofa for 2 persons in the living room. Equipped with Dryer / Washer and dishwasher and the building has and elevator as well. And best of all... the apartment has a prviate rooftop terrace where you can enjoy your morning coffee or a glass of wine.
Located only a 10 minute walk away from the Kongens Nytorv (Centre of the City), the apartment is situated very near to famous places such as Copenhagen Cathedral, The Round Tower, The Danish Film Institute (Museum and Cinema). Also not far away from several restaurants and cafe.
Towels and sheets

name: Walk to every major attraction in Copenhagen.
description:
In the very heart of old Copenhagen, walking distance to almost any attraction, brand new refurbish apartment in a 300 years old building, right in the city center. All done with respect of the original arkitekture. The apartment has an open layout, on one and a half floor, brand new modern bathroom, one king size bed 180x200 and one daybed 140x200 for two person.

The space
The apartment has two connecting main rooms, on one and a half floor. Living and bedroom are up and there is a dressing room area that holds the daybed and connects to the brand new bathroom, on the down part of the apartment.
The kitchen connects to the livingroom, which also holds the sleeping area.

You should be aware...!!! there are a minimum Hights in the bedroom part of the apartment on 190 cm, so if you are a former baseball player and you walk in your sleep.... one might bang one?s head...!!!
The apartment is on the first floor and in the backhouse of an 300 years

name: Beautiful apartment in heart of shopping district
description:
Lovely apartment in the center of historical Copenhagen. 110 square metres of cozy and stylish decor in vintage Scandinavian style within an apartment built in 1790's.

Everything begins at the doorstep, the view from the window is the shopping street, K?bmagergade.

Walking distance to all Copenhagen's attractions such as Nyhavn or the park Kongens Have. 10 minute walk to Torvehallerne green and specialty food market. 5 minute walk to closest grocery store and 2 minute walk to 7-11.

The space
This is a family apartment setup for life with 2 small children. The large bedroom is the children's room with 2 single beds, many toys and books for children aged 0-10 years. The grown-up bedroom sits between the children's room and the living room with a large screen television and a cozy king sized bed set into the nook. The living room also offers a sofa that can open up to a bed. 2 highchairs are available as well as all children sized plates

name: Charming, cute, clean w balcony ??of Latin Quarter
description:
Charming and cosy flat in the heart of central Copenhagen. The middle age city, also called the Latin Quarter. The most lovely and vibrant area in all Cph. From the flat you reach everything in the city center by foot. You have the best of Cph at your door step.

The apartment is in the back yard, withdrawn from the street, and safe with a gate, and you can enjoy sitting on the private balcony with your coffee and a drink. The building also has a private green garden you are welcome to use.

The space
This area is the original old historical Cph, and is the very heart of the city center. Here in Sankt Peders Str‘de in my historical street and building, you will live in the most charming area. This is the middle age city center, the houses dated hundreds of years back and carefully restored and maintained. Here you live the history of Copenhagen, and walk and sleep and eat in the footsteps of Kirkegaard, HC Andersen, Bohr and all the other great artists

name: Romantic apartment ? Heart of Copenhagen!
description:
* Flot, rummelig og moderne by-lejlighed
* 75 kvm + 10 kvm altan
* Central beliggenhed
* t‘t p† hovedbaneg†rden

name: Nyhavn Copenhagen - Beautiful  home prime location
description:
Beautiful spacious home in the most charming and exclusive part of Copenhagen next to Nyhavn, The Royal Palace and the water front.
Easy access by foot to main attractions, restaurants, The Royal Theatre, art galleries and Metro.
3 living rooms
2 Bedrooms , 2 sofa beds, , 170 m2

Guest access
Entire apartment.

name: Central and Quiet
description:
In the middle of centrum and yet quiet, no traffic street. Double bed in a private room. Garage. Two bathrooms. Modern, light and warm apt.

The space
Double bed, private room with a direct acces to one of our terraces. Two bathrooms with heated floor (one with a shower cabin, toilet, washing machine and a dryer, the other one with a bath tub and a toilet). Spacious kitchen. TV in your room and living room. High speed Wi-Fi.
Our apt is in a modern building that's why well isolated and warm. Walking distance to the Town Hall Square and all the attractions the city can offer ( 5-6 min ) and the easiest accessibility to the airport only 15 min from here by train.
Private parking in underground locked garage optional . ( on previous request, 10?/ per day paid cash when you park the car )

Guest access
Access to our both bathrooms , living room, kitchen , both terraces and underground garage ( cheaper than parking in the street - o

name: Private bedroom in beautiful central lakeside apt
description:
This very centrally located and beautiful apartment is full of light, good vibes, character and charm. The communal west-facing roof terrace offers stunning views of the lake, city skyline and the setting sun.

The space
The 4th floor apartment is beautifully designed and furnished, and has oak floors throughout. For rent is a cozy private bedroom (7sqm) with a double bed and shared access to a fully equipped kitchen, a bathroom with a bathtub/shower, and a large rooftop terrace with table and chairs. There is a super fast (300Mb/s) wifi connection, an elevator, and all bedding and towels are provided.
The apartment is in a 1930s listed building and is just a short walk from Copenhagen?s cinema and meat-packing districts, the main shopping street (Str?get), Tivoli, parks, museums, galleries and an array of restaurants, cafes and bars.

Guest access
A private bedroom, shared kitchen and bathroom, shared roof terrace and all listed ameniti

name: Smack in the middle of Copenhagen!
description: Newly renovated apartment in the middle of Copenhagen. Only 350 m to N?rreport, 200 m to Torvehallerne, 250 m to S?erne and so on. Both the bathroom and kitchen are newly renovated, and has all the amenities one could want. Cosy and charming. Situated between two courtyards, so there is no noise.

name: Apartment in the sweet spot of CPH
description:
Get the most out of your Copenhagen stay with this wonderfully cosy apartment with authentic designer furniture and details, located in a calm cobblestoned road in the literal sweet spot of the city!

The apartment is 1 minute away from the public metro station Kongens Nytorv

Please note that the bathroom is currently undergoing renovation, resulting in visible piping in the ceiling.

name: Charming Apartment Latin Quarter close to Tivoli
description:
Cozy apartment in the Latin Quarter located in charming court yard paved with cobblestones. Most turist attractions are within walking distance, e.g. Tivoli, R†dhuspladsen, Str?get, Vor Frue Kirke, Torvehallerne etc.

Other things to note
Two small bedrooms with twin beds, 140 x 200 and 160 x 200.
Very basic bathroom with shower.
Outstanding location.

name: Live in the heart of Copenhagen.
description:
Great cosy big appartement in the middle of everything and placed in the very charming Nansensgade-quarter. The district is well-known for it's charming caf‚es, restaurants, shops and Food Market-Torvehallerne. It's close to everything: Str?get/shopping street, N?rreport station, Metro station, Botanical Garden etc.

The space
We love our appartement in the middle of everything. The appartement is 125 kvm. and has 3 rooms, large kitchen, big living room, large bathroom and some great neighbors:-)

Guest access
The whole appartement is yours. We are not home.

name: Central Canal Apartment 3
description:
One room flat. With king size or two single beds, kitchen with toaster, fridge, coffee machine and kettle are provided in the apartment. There is also a dining area and/or a patio.

Great one room apartment in a Cosy area in old part of Copenhagen . Most sights are walkable from here. Situated right in the popular area Christianshavn. Restaurants & shops right next to where you will be staying. 5 minutes walk away from the world famous Christiania

name: Cozy top floor apartment city center of Copenhagen
description:
New shower and generally upgraded the bathroom in Feb/March 2020*
This is a 2 bedroom with 4 single or 2 double beds, plus a sofa if need be.
The apartment is on the 3rd floor of a 18th Century building, located on "Str‘det" which is a walking street parallel to "Str?get", the wolds longest walking and shopping street in Copenhagen City. You will be within walking distance to most of what you will need for your stay in Copenhagen.

The space
This is my own small cozy apartment in my late 18th Century building that is located in the most central part of Copenhagen city, with great access to everything. Tivoli, canal tours, Nyhavn walks, museums, fancy shopping on the walking street, huge variety of cafes and restaurants....all is available by just stepping out of the building.
Commute to and from Copenhagen Airport and the Central Train Station is super easy and with 5 minutes walk from the Metro station on Kongens Nytorv.

Guest access

name: Rent A Place 5/  5 Bedrooms &  2 Bathrooms
description:
BRAND NEW DECORATED APARTMENT :

The apartment consists of 5 big bedrooms & 2 bathrooms, a large living & Tv room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, Two separate bathrooms . Big flat-screen TV is available.

Central area of Copenhagen, Rent a Place 5 has city views from the big private terrace. The property is 500 metres from Tivoli Gardens and 1.2 km from Nyhavn, next door Town Hall.

Christiania is 1.9 km from the apartment. Copenhagen Airport is 7 km from the property.

The space
The apartment consists of 5 bedrooms & 2 bathrooms, a large living & Tv room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a kettle, and a two bathrooms . A flat-screen TV is available.
BIG terrace overlooking Copenhagen Inner city

Other things to note
BIG PRIVATE TERRACE OVERLOOKING COPENHAGEN

name: Bright, modern and top-central lux apartement
description: Large classical apartment (from 1880) with balcony. tree bedrooms, 164 m2. Fun and safe for children, comfortable for adults. Easy access from airport (metro 15 min). Flat is next to metro, busses, trains. Located in Inner City (50 meter to The Lakes), liveliest part of Copenhagen, 5 minutes on foot to Rosenborg Castle, parks, museums, playgrounds and Cph's most elegant food mall ("Torvehallerne"). Yet quiet sleeping!

name: Out on the water
description:
Are you interested in sharing with me my beautiful 50 feet sailing boat. It has a living room/kitchen, three cabins and a bathroom. During 2020 I am moored in the protected bay outside the barbor of Port de Pollensa. Maybe sailing a little around in the neighbourhood.

The space
The boat is old, but of high quality and newly renovated.

Guest access
Living on my boat implies using everything jointly.

name: 4-bedded private room
description:
At Danhostel Copenhagen City you stay in a 5-star high standard design Hostel in the heart of Copenhagen.

The space
Danhostel Copenhagen City is located in the heart of Copenhagen - only a few minutes walk from Copenhagen main train station, Copenhagen City Hall, the Tivoli Gardens and Copenhagen's main shopping street "Str?get".

We accommodate up to 1020 guests and our large breakfast area, our bar, our spacious rooms with a great design, our room with toys for kids and much more means that we have room for everyone - backpackers, families, large groups and school camps.

Great news!

The construction of our brand new lobby, new reception, new lounge and super cool new bar in our new dining hall has started!
Additionally, we are modernising out elevators in order to make it easier and faster for our guests to move around the house.

We will stay open during the construction period and we will continue to offer breakf

name: Penthouse apartment (2 stories) in the City Center
description:
Penthouse in Copenhagen City Centre.

The apartment is a 2 story penthouse, and is perfect if you want to get straight into town.

The space
The apartment is a recently renovated, 200 year old converted storage warehouse. It is light and very open, and a wonderful place to relax (particularly in summer). It has a shared courtyard downstairs where you can park your bike.

Guest access
It is located on the 4th and 5th level, and this means a few flights of stairs to get to the top

Other things to note
When booking, please tell me something about yourself and why you are visiting Copenhagen

name: Unique holiday oasis in the heart of Copenhagen!
description:
The spacious apartment has the most optimal location in the middle of Copenhagen. Within a 5 min walk you will find:

Torvehallerne gourmet food hall (100 meters)
N?rreport Station (Metro direct from CPH Airport)
'Str?get' - main shopping street
Great bars, restaurants and caf‚s

More information
Add another 5 mins. and you will reach:
Tivoli
Main train station
All major tourist attractions.

Just across from the apartment, you can rent bikes and explore the city like a real Copenhagener.

The space
The apartment is decorated with inspiration from various places. We enjoy to travel and always bring back an element that somehow fit into the whole expression of the space. Classic danish Arne Jacobsen furniture combined with handmade Tanzanian sculptures and vintage industrial design creates a unique and cosy environment.

Guest access
You will have access to all parts of the apart

name: Center of Copenhagen, 80 square meters w. balcony
description:
Modern, new, 80 square meters flat with balcony, in the heart of Copenhagen. 5 minuttes walk to Kongens Nytorv, Nyhavn, and the main shoppingstreet. Lots of restaurants just around the corner and three diffrent supermarkeds within 100 meters. 10-15 minuts walk to the little mermaid, Royal Amalienborg and many more. Elevator in the building.

The space
Dansk: Moderne, ny, 80 kvadratmeter lejlighed med altan i hjertet af K?benhavn. 5 minutters gang til Kongens Nytorv, Nyhavn og den str?jet. Masser af restauranter lige rundt om hj?rnet og tre forskellige supermarkeder inden for 100 meter. 10-15 minutters gang til den lille havfrue, Royal Amalienborg og mange andre sp‘ndende sev‘rdigheder. Der er elevator i bygningen.

Guest access
Hele lejligheden.

5-star design hostel in the centre of Copenhagen!

The apartment os located in the "Nansensgade" area, with a beautiful view to the lake "Peblinge s?". The apartment has a long entry, 2 bedrooms, a livingroom, a kitchen and a toilet :) Also, we have a very nice closed yard, where you can enjoy the sun.

Here you will have the best base in Copenhagen.

Very central and an easy base to discover all of Copenhagen from.
The floors has been sanded, so not all the rooms have white floors :)

With a functionall and full equipped kitchen.

description:
The apartment is located in inner Copenhagen in the middle of the vibrant shopping district.
The apartment is facing a courtyard, but you can still hear the rich citylife in the background.
The neighboorhood is filled with caf‚es, bars and shopping opportunities. The famous street "Str?get" is an arms length from the apartment, and runs through the entire midtown.
The apartment is perfect for a couple, but it is also good for a Family or 3 or 4 friends or Mom, Dad and 2 kids.

The space
The apartment has two main rooms, a livingroom and a bedroom. The bathroom is with a shower. The bathroom is small, but it does the job. Kitchen has washingmachine. In the bedroom there is a king-size double bed and an inserted shelf on which in particular the children think it is fun to sleep. In the living room there is a brand new comfortable sofa bed, so here is plenty of sleeping space. However, the size of the apartment, 55 m2 means that it, besides a couple, i

description:
Sunny and spacious apartment with 1 bedroom in a beautiful and safe area in the heart of Copenhagen. Associated with the apartment is a shared roof terrace, where you can enjoy the sun all day.

Location doesn't get more central than this, whilst the beautiful parks ?stre Anl‘g and Oerstedparken is only a few metres away.

Right by N?rreport as well, so great public transport links to other parts of the city and the airport.

1 bedroom, a living room, a dining room, kitchen and bathroom for your private use. All bedlinens and towels are provided for guests.

description:

My apartment is perfect for the group that wants to travel together but enjoy their own space and privacy.My apt is located right In the heart of copenhagen. A perfect spot for a group of friends or family. My apartment is just in the heart of where you want to stay when you visit Copenhagen. Lots of space, separate baths/toilets. 2 large living rooms and 3 kitchen.

name: Lovely quiet appartment in central copenhagen
description:
Located in historic Copenhagen this appartment is surrounded by green areas consisting of two lovely cemeteries and a park that used to be a part of Copenhagens old fortification ring.

The area is a perfect combination of peacefullness, but with a central location. In walking distance you can find the Little Mermaid, Kastellet and Amalienborg. Within a 100 ms of the appartment there is a station (?sterbro st.) that contains metro, s-trains and busses that takes you around the city.

The space
The appartment is a cozy 1-bedroom appartment around 60 m2 large. The apartment is on the 5th floor and has great natural light. It contains a bedroom, livingroom, bathroom and a kitchen.

The appartment is great for single travellers or couples. If you want to cook there is a fully equipped kitchen that you can use and there are several supermarkets right nearby. The bathroom is brand new and has two different shower heads and nice warm water. There i

description:
In a side street to Nyhavn is Toldbodgade where you find the apartment Brooklyn where you are located in the heart of Copenhagen. You'll have all the best restaurants and more right where you're located.

? BE AWARE THAT the price is really cheap compared to other hosts who demand more money for apartments in Nyhavn which aren't even located in Nyhavn.

More information can be found below!

The space
Copenhagen prides itself on having well preserved authentic apartments, and my apartment is one of those. Built-in the 1600s, my apartment allows guests to experience the beauty of authentic danish architecture. I?ve allowed myself to go ?all-in? in terms of interior design - choosing only the best of luxury furniture.

Guest access
The apartment is comprised of 3 bedrooms, each equipped with a double bed. I understand that having a really clear understanding of the home's configuration is a critical aspect of planning a trip

description:
Cosy apartment in the city center. The apartment has everything you need for cooking, a bathroom with a shower-niche, a bedroom and a big open kitchen. There is a tv i the apartment with a Playstation 4, Netflix and HBO.

The space
The apartment is located on a quiet street, right next to the botanical garden, Torvehallerne and the lakes of Copenhagen. It is perfect for exploring both the inner city and just a short walk to the vibrant multicultural N?rrebro area. N?rreport station, is only a 5 minute walk from the apartment, and from there you can easily go to other parts og both Copenhagen and Denmark by bus, train og metro. From Copenhagen airport it's just a 15 min ride with the metro to N?rreport station.

description:
Nice and bright apartment with an unparalleled location in the Inner City, where the Parisian atmosphere, cobbled streets and old properties form a cozy neighborhood. Yet you live on the top floor at a newer building with elevator.

If you walk down the street, you immediately notice a very special atmosphere - a wealth of cafes and clothing stores side by side, while Kongens Have, Rundetaarn, a playground, Kongens Nytorv or the food courts at Torvehallerne are only a short walk away.

You have 74 m2 (796 ft2) with a master bedroom and an extra room which can be used as an office or bedroom.

The apartment is equipped with everything need as most of year this is my base in Copenhagen.

Here you'll be given the chance to live in one of Copenhagen's oldest and most famous Danish timbered houses. Completely renovated for modern-day living. On a cute quiet street- right next to the biggest shopping street in Copenhagen (Str?get).

The space

It a absolute home away from the home. Apartment is stretched over two floors (I.e. ground floor and basement). The bedrooms are located in the basement.

A cozy, modernized two stories terraced house of 130 m2 with private and sunny terrace and all amenities. Perfect for the family with small children, the couple that values space or a group of good friends. Exceptionally located due to the area's close proximity to the city center in an oasis of green areas with quiet nights and walking distance to world class restaurants (Noma, Amass) and cafes (La Banchina), free outdoor swimming, street food market (Reffen), beautiful routes for jogging etc.

The space

description:
A beautiful 140 square meters city house 2.2 km from Nyhavn. A 15-20 minute walk across the canal to get to the heart of Copenhagen.

Two bikes with two child seats are included in the rent.

There are two toilets, two bedrooms, a spacious kitchen with a dining table and a very spacious and cozy living room with a 60" high-end TV, Apple TV and Sonos speakers.

There are terraces on each side of the house and a large shared garden.

With two bathrooms and two bedrooms, groups of 4 adults or 4 adults and one child can easily be accommodated.

You have the apartment completely to yourself, and you are welcome to use everything (kitchen utensils ect) in the apartment as your own.

There is a large double bed with a great memory foam matress and there is even a large balcony where you can enjoy the sun from morning to evening.

The apartment is close to literally everything! Whether you like to go to restaurants, bars, visit tourist attractions ect - its right here!

The lovely apartment has a big kitchen-dining room, a livingroom, a bedroom and a bathroom. The kitchen is fully equipped if you want to prepare your own meals. Furthermore there's acces to a big courtyard (see pictures) with trees, grass, a playground and a barbecue. There's high speed wi-fi in the apartment as well. The apartment is on the first floor so it is easy accessible with luggage.

name: Home.. but away in the center of Copenhagen
description:
Flat on the 4th floor in a listed building (FYI- please be aware there is no lift) with the view over the roofs of the old part of Copenhagen. There is one flat on each floor with private entrance. You are in the center with the main shopping streets, cafes and restaurants literally when you walk out the main door. . You have squares, gardens, key monuments and museums just around the corner.

The space
Everything can be arranged from ordering theatre tickets. Book restaurants. You name it and we will do everything in our power to make it happen.

Guest access
you have the entire flat at your disposal.

Other things to note
*The bathroom has a shower (FYI please be aware you need to turn on the switch in order to turn on the water in the shower)
*You need to go through the main bedroom to enter the bathroom. Please see floorpan (photos)
* The flat is on the 4 floor. No lift;-D

name: Cosy apt. in Latin quarter of Copenhagen
description:
Cosy city apartment with beautiful garden right in the very heart of Copenhagen, situated in the charming Latin quarter with unique 'village' atmosphere, local cafes, shops and more. Bedroom, living room, kitchen, bathroom. Comfortably fits two.

The space
Cosy apartment located in the Latin quarter - our bohemian and relaxed little 'village' in the very heart of Copenhagen with easy access to public transport, great restaurants, small cafes, quaint shops, sightseeing places in walking distance and more.

The apartment is placed in one of the quarter's many old charming buildings that date back to the mid 1700s and have been renovated to accommodate modern living.

As a guest in our 2-room apartment (60 m2), you will enjoy a light living room, comfortable bedroom, a small yet functional bathroom and ditto kitchen with all necessary appliances.

Even though you will be living in the very heart of Copenhagen, you will find that life h

name: The best location- charming apartment in the city!
description:
Live in one of the locals favorite areas of the city! Cute apartment that sleeps 4 in the center of the city, but set on a quiet road in a friendly neighborhood.

Tivoli, the famous amusement park is close by - palaces, parks, shopping and more are all within easy reach.

We hope you will enjoy your visit to the city in our comfortable central apartment

The space
The apartment is situated on the 1st floor. There is a flat at ground level underneath our flat, so by American standards you would call it 2nd floor (still not many stairs!)

It is a small but cozy apartment with everything you need for your stay.

The apartment is newly renovated and has a balcony overlooking the beautiful green courtyard that residents can relax in in the sunshine. The balcony looks out over the green area.

In the main bedroom there is a king size bed

In the second room there is a sofabed that sleeps 2 people comfortably

name: Bo centralt i K?benhavn / Central Copenhagen
description: Velkommen til en lejlighed beliggende centralt i K?benhavn K, p† den charmerende Nansensgade.  Nansensgade ligger central i K?benhavn K. Lejlighed med eget k?kken, sovev‘relse og stue med spiseplads. Der er toilet i lejligheden og en brusekabine. // 1 bedroom, living room, kitchen and a green backyard. Toilet in the aparment and a bath.  Close to many things in copenhagen, Tivoli, Str?get, Nyhavn ect. The neighbourhood has a lots og restaurants and cafes.

name: Green and cosy 20 minutes distance to city
description:
Cosy apartment with beautiful garden in green area not far from N?rrebro.

The space
Notice this is not located next to Tivoli but 20 minutes away as headline shows :) this is a mistake from google maps. You will get the correct location after booking.

You will have your own 1-room nice private apartment with a kitchen for making tea and cooking simple meals (no oven)

SLEEPING:
The sofa bed opens and closes easily. But put a hand on it when it opens so it stays down.

COOKING:
There is one induction place for cooking. You open by holding down the lock until it turns off. It is heats up super fast. Use the kettle for boiling water on the induction.

FOOD SHOPPING:
Walk up the street Degnmose All‚ and you will find Netto and Aldi. Both good for grocery shopping.

BARBECUE
You can use the barbecue in the garden. You just have to buy coal and so on in the shop. And clean up after yourself ?

name: Rent A Place / 2BR
description:
Beautiful and charming 150m2 apartment - sleeping 4 adults, couples, family & friends...This apartment is located in a central location in Inner City Copenhagen. 3 minutes walk the metro and surrounded by walking streets and ALL major sights meaning the area is quiet and still extremely central.

The space
The apartment has two private bedrooms, all with King size double beds 180 x 200. Cosy living room, open dining area with dining table for 4 people, bath room with shower and a fully equipped kitchen.
The apartment contains all modern facilities to make your stay pleasant and easy going.

Guest access
Entire flat

name: 2-bedroom flat at the iconic Nyhavn canals
description:
2 bedroom apartment with a beautiful terrace in the heart of Nyhavn iconic part of Copenhagen.
- Best location at the Nyhavn iconic houses
- Right at the boat canal trips
- Beautiful terrace towards the quiet backyard
- Lots of restaurants, bars and cafes around for every taste

The space
BEDROOMS

Bedroom 1
- Queen sized bed to enjoy a good night sleep
- White stylish nightstands on the sides with reading laps
- Long wood color chest of drawers
- Green decoration flowers

Bedroom 2
- Queen sized bed to enjoy a good night sleep
- Tall white wardrobe & Wood color chest of drawers
- Hard wood table with chairs that is also laptop friendly

THE TERRACE
- The place to be on the summer days
- Listen to the birds and feel the warmth of the sun
- Enjoy your breakfast, a good coffee or relax by reading a good book with the sun in your hair :)
- Foldab

name: Modern and authentic townhouse in central CPH
description:
Modern and authentic townhouse with a little garden in the backyard. The house is located in the famouse "Kartoffelr‘kker" in walking distance to the city center, 50 meters from the Copenhagen lakes and close to several beautiful parks.

The space
The three-storied house was built in 1879 in a unique historical neighborhood - close to shopping, great restaurants, cultural sites and wonderful parks.

Within the last years, the house was thoroughly renovated and appears as a modern, functional and cozy home ? perfect for families or persons who search for a small oasis in the middle of Copenhagen.

The house is 140 m2. It has four bedrooms, one with a double bed, one with a double sleeping couch and a loftbed (140 cm mattress), one with another loftbed (160 cm mattress) and one with a small bed for children up to 4 years. Pleace notice that you have to climb up a ladder to access the loft beds. It has a nice and quiet living room with a French

name: Live easy in historic Copenhagen
description:
The space
Welcome to a nice 3-room apartment in the middle of historic Copenhagen.

Outside the windows is the small yellow houses build by the king almost 400 years ago for The Royal Danish Marine. And still in use.

The appartment is inside the old ramparts surrounding ancient Copenhagen and just a short walk from the harbour with the Little Mermaid, the Kastel fortress, The Royal Palais and green parks. It's in the central area of Copenhagen close to caf‚'s, old bars and public transportation is just around the corner..

The flat is cosy and we keep it clean. One separate sleepingroom, one living room, well equipped kitchen for cooking, but, sorry, no dishwasher. You will have to do that oldschool-style.

Nice bathroom. Cabinets for clothes. Internet. No washingmachine but laundry round the block.

It's a five-store building with good people, who goes to work in the morning, so we have to ask you to be quiet after 11 at

name: Stylish & beautiful flat in trendy historical area
description:
Welcome to your home away from home in the heart of wonderful Copenhagen!

The apartment is located right next to Kongens Nytorv and Nyhavn in the city center of Copenhagen. It?s a beautiful 81 sqm apartment in a historical building from 1870 that has been newly renovated.

You'll have all the main attractions within 5-10 min walking distance and live in a trendy area with loads of restaurants and shops. But no worries, your sleep will not be disturbed as the apt. is located on a quiet street.

The space
The apartment was build in 1870. It has crooked details but is in great condition. It is a 3 room apartment with 1 bedroom, 2 living rooms, 1 kitchen and a newly renovated bathroom with rain shower.

name: City Center! Charming place to feel Danish Hygge!!
description:
Charming home in the city centre of Copenhagen. With its 5o square meters, it appeals to couples or close friends. As soon as you walk out the front door you experience the Danish "hygge" vibe, with the best sushi restaurant across the street and quality winebars. Only a stone throw away from Tivoli, Kings Gardens, Str?get, Botanical gardens and the lakes you will be able to experience Copenhagen by foot. Looking forward to hosting you.

The space
Small traditional Copenhagen apartment - with a lot of charm. It is unique in its own little way, as it is inside the courtyard, making it very quiet, even though it is so central.

You sleep in a dunlopillo bed, securing a wonderful nights sleep.

Guest access
I will hand deliver the key to you. :-)

name: Bright & Centrally Located Apt with Balcony
description:
Beautiful, bright apartment centrally located close to all neighborhoods. This second floor walk-up is steps from the city center and most public transport.
It features a balcony, access to an amazing courtyard, 2 living spaces and a fully equipped kitchen with 5 burner stove. Sleeps up to 6 people with 3 bedrooms. The office space has been converted to a home gym with light dumbbells, few kettlebells and a luxury exercise bike.

Guest access
Common green court yard.

name: Charmerende 3 v., med beliggenhed i hjertet af KBH
description: Charmerende lejlighed i hjertet af K?benhavn, 94 kvm. Ligger 2 min. gang til str?get, Tivoli, Christiansborg og R†dhuspladsen. 10 min. gang til n‘rmeste metro (N?rreport & Kongens Nytorv).

name: Beautiful Apartment in the Heart of Copenhagen
description:
The apartment is about 100m^2 and is blessed with amazing natural lighting throughout, especially on the side facing the street. The apartment is also an old luxury flat which we have kept intact so you can enjoy the beautiful original ceiling decorations and herringbone parquet floors. The decoration style is very homey and personal and the decor is made up of things collected over the years and found in peculiar antique boutiques as well as modern
Danish design.

The space
The kitchen is a great space for cooking together, the kitchen table allows people to sit and grab a drink while others prepare the food, we also have a "G" home that can play music, the news, set the lights (we have hue lights in the entire apartment) and set timers. The dinning room is a lovely place to enjoy your meals! The table can be extended and there are extra chairs so more people can join in. The living room is a perfect place to relax, read, watch something or work (if neces

name: Stay in the center of the center of the city :)
description:
Very cosy apartment placed at the famous shopping street Str?get. Every major sights are in walking distance.

Allthough that the apartment are placed where everything happens, it is very queit and without any noise from traffic or the daily busy life. It's close to The Central Station, N?rreport Station ( Metro, S-Train and busses )

The apartment got three rooms, a kitchen and a bathroom. It's approximately 65 square meters.

The space
Lejligheden er i et gammelt hus fra 1850. Den har indvendigt bindingsv‘rk. P† trods af at den ligger midt i centrum af K?benhavns gamle middelalderby er der i lejligheden utroligt stille.

Guest access

name: Townhouse in Copenhagen
description:
Townhouse in one of the most popular areas in Copenhagen right by the lakes, great food experiences just around the corner and walking distance to downtown.

The space
One front yard and back yard.

Guest access
Access to the entire townhouse.

Other things to note
We are updating pictures

name: Lovely little gem in the heart of Copenhagen
description:
My apartment is a lovely little gem and have all you need for a perfect holiday in Copenhagen. You can use my apartment to stay in, making dinner and relax or just as a perfection location to live in Copenhagen, with the buzzing life right outside the window.
My "neighbor" is the historical Nicolaj Church - dont worry, there is no bells ringing ;) Lots of sightseeing, shopping opportunities and public transport near by.

name: Single Room at Hotel Alexandra
description:
Over the past 20 years, Hotel Alexandra in Copenhagen has carefully sourced a large collection of world-famous Danish mid-century vintage furniture, and decorated its 61 rooms with them.

Combined with textiles, wallpapers and other period gems, we take you back in time to experience living like the design-loving Danes did in the 50's and 60's.


All rates are pr. room, pr. night and include VAT, service fees and environmental fees.

The space
As soon as you step into the Hotel Alexandra in Copenhagen, you enter a magical time bubble of exquisite Danish design and calm.

In the evening you can relax in the lobby, choose a favourite vinyl record from our selection, or delve into some design books from the library, while we serve you a complimentary glass of wine ? all the while being surrounded by the finest Danish designer furniture.

Our greatest passion is to make our guests feel at home and create a memorable experie

name: Double Room at Hotel Alexandra

name: Room in the absolute center of Copenhagen
description:
This is center of the old town in Copenhagen - located at the famous pedestrian shopping street "Str?get". Every major sights in Copenhagen are within walking distance. Close to metro, the central station, Kings New Square and Town Hall. The room is located in an apartment in an old house from 1850. Though it's in the middle of the most lively part of the city, the room is nice and quiet - no traffic noise at all.

The space
Your room is apart from the rest of the apartment - no walls adjacent to the rest of the apartment. You have to share the bathroom with me. You can use the kitchen and you can sit and eat in the dining room.

name: Live as a local in CPH
description:
Located very close to the City center in a nice quiet area of Copenhagen. Cozy neighbourhood with many cafe's and restaurants.
This is our home and we live here while you visit. You will have your own room with access to coffee and your own private bathroom with shower. We have a small friendly dog (see picture)

The space
Our home is old but cozy. The room you will have available is sunny and with window facing a nice green backyard.
WiFi available and also with working space area.

Other things to note
We are situated in a very calm part of Copenhagen but you might hear People walking in and out of the building and the gate to the yard or the laundry machines running. Depending on what day your stay with us, you might also hear the garbage collectors in the morning. If needed earplugs are available in the room - we don?t need them but just to be sure everyone gets their beauty sleep.

name: Room in charming central apartment
description:
The apartment is located very central. 5 min. walking distance to N?rreport station and the lakes. Even though it's centrally located, the street is very quiet.

Since we invite you into our home, you will experience how a daily life for danish people are. I have two roommates but the apartment is approx 200 m2, which means there are plenty of space.

The space
We have two bathrooms, where you can use both freely.

name: [Luxury] Guldmagerens Hus, Nyhavn 59
description:
Guldmagerens Hus is located in the new end of Nyhavn and it is named after the alchemist and coppersmith Henrik Ehm who tried to create gold in the 1700?s.

This apartment is for the people who expect luxury, fast travel, quality, and great atmosphere!

The restaurant offers a delicious Danish-French menu card and a wide range of the best wines from all around the world.

The space
Copenhagen prides itself on having well preserved authentic apartments, and my apartment is one of those. Built-in the 1600s, my apartment allows guests to experience the beauty of authentic danish architecture. I?ve allowed myself to go ?all-in? in terms of interior design - choosing only the best of luxury furniture.

Guest access
The apartment is comprised of 3 bedrooms, each equipped with a double bed. I understand that having a really clear understanding of the home's configuration is a critical aspect of planning a trip as a group.
Th

name: Family aparment in city centre - great atmosphere
description:
Spacious and bright apartment. In the middle of the historic part of Copenhagen with the Danish House of parlament, Nyhavn and The Royal Theatre as the closest neighbours you will find this calm oasis. This place is perfect for the couple, small familily or friends travelling. The entire apparment is at your disposal. There is also a balcony, fantastic court yard and a great atmosphere. A calm neighborhood right by the habour (if you stick your head out the window you see the water)

The space
This is a great and very cosy place with a fantastic atmosphere. We treasure our home - contrary to some airbnb places, we do live here as a family :) Please have this in mind as you enjoy your stay.
This also means that you will find marks on the walls that the kids have left and maybe a little dust on the top shelves. It is an authentic experience of a Danish home :)
Feel free to play with toys and roam around the kitchen to find what you need, but please put eve

name: Entire 1 bedroom apartment, Central Location
description:
Cosy 1-bedroom apartment located in central Copenhagen, at the doorstep of many of the tourist attractions and bordered by some of the most beautiful and lovely parks in the city.

A quiet and safe residential neighbourhood - lively in the day and quiet at night, yet only a 10-15 minutes walk from the 'old town' centre.

The space
The apartment has a living space with plenty of plants, bedroom, a small but modern bathroom and a small, but fully functional kitchen of older date.

The living room offers a dining area, a piano, and a projector to screen a movie on a rainy day.

As for the bedroom, we kindly direct the attention of our guests to the bed, which is only a 'small double' - meaning 120cm wide. Depending on what you are used to, some do find this kind of bed too small to share for two people.

Please notice in the photos to see which bed we can offer.

Guest access
Please note, as the buildin

name: Cozy & Bright Apartment in Copenhagen City Center
description:
Modern and bright studio apartment in the city center!

Cozy living room and sleeping area with TV, Chromecast and Wi-Fi.
Two french balconies from where you can enjoy the sun in the afternoon and evening.
Fully equipped kitchen and bathroom.

Located next to Kings Garden and only 10 mins walk to Kongens Nytorv Metro and N?rreport Station.

Perfect for your stay in Copenhagen!

name: Discover Hygge in a Lovely Apartment in CPH Centre
description: This apartment is right in the city centre in Copenhagen, close to activities, shopping and national landmarks. The rooms are spacious and light, decorated with a love for Scandivian design. The apartment is perfect for a couple looking for a romantic weekend escape or a single person looking for adventure.

name: Light & cosy appartment in the heart of Copenhagen
description:
Bright and cosy appartment located in the heart of Copenhagen only 30 minutes from the airport by metro. If you want to live in a quiet area but in the middle of the city, this appartment is your perfect match. By its central location you are not more than 15 min away from everything. From here you can easily get around the city by foot or the danish way - on a bike.

The space
You have access to your own private balcony located to a calm backyard covered in sunlight from 10am-6.30pm. The appartment has excellent cooking facilities and a dishwasher, which you are more than welcome to use.

Guest access
The entire appartment

Other things to note
This appartment is not appropriate for anyone with dog allergies.

name: Cosy flat with balcony and unique location in CPH
description:
Peaceful and bright top floor apartment with sunny balcony. 5th floor, no elevator.

The space
1 bedroom (double bed 150 cm wide), living room, kitchen, dish washer, washing machine, 5th floor (no lift).

Guest access
The whole apartment.

Other things to note
Key is picked up and dropped off at a 7-eleven (10 min walk.) If you arrive with metro from airport, the 7-eleven is near the metro station (N?rreport Station).

name: Apartment In the heart of Copenhagen
description:
The flat is located in the heart of Copenhagen city and just around the corner from N?rreport station.
You will find Copenhagens biggest shopping street Str?get only 5/10 minute walking distance away from the flat. Many attractions are located in my neighborhood so as the castles, city hall, Tivoli, The kings garden, Nyhavn, Torvehallerne, museums or if you just wanna go for lunch, dinner or maybe just grab a beer or two there are many possibilities close by the flat.

The space
My apartment is in a very old building and has lots of charm with its wooden floors, high panels etc. It contains two bedrooms, one livingroom, one big kitchen, a hall and bathroom. So in general the flat is very convenient for anyone who wants to see Copenhagen. Unfortunately we haven't got any curtains in the master bedroom yet in the apartment, but you can enjoy the lovely evening sun.

We're excited to be hosting you!

Charming 125m2 apartment next to The Queen.

name: CityCentre Apartment w. Balcony & 25min to Airport
description:
This Scandinavian cosy apartment is located in the City centre of Copenhagen with fast and easy access from the Airport.

In this apartment, you will be able to step out the door and find yourself within steps of the best the city has to offer; Nyhavn, Stroeget, Tivoli Gardens, Rosenborg Castle, Rundetaarn, NOMA, the Little Mermaid, Michelin restaurants, shopping and much more.

*Fruit and snacks will be provided to my guests upon arrival.

Suited for friends, families or couples.

Welcome!

name: Luxury 'Kings Garden' City-Flat In Center Of Town
description:
You Won't Find a More Central Place to Stay in Copenhagen! This charming, Tudor-style City Apartment, is Only a 2-minute Walk from The Famous "Kings Garden", "Rosenborg Castle", and "Str?get"- Copenhagen's Main Shopping Street.

Perfect for a romantic holiday, or for a simple, productive environment if you're in Copenhagen for work. You'll have an authentic Copenhagen experience when staying here. This place is incredibly comfortable, and I bet you'll love the cozy atmosphere.

The space
The apartment is from 1732 - the Tudor-styled walls and bedroom ceiling create a warm and charming atmosphere, making the apartment truly unique.

The whole place (63 square meters) has recently been completely renovated, so it will be and feel totally new.

The spacious living room has a comfortable sofa/TV area with plenty of space. Next to this is an elegant dining table with a nice view of the street. The living room also has a dedicated workspace

name: large, cute apartment in the center of Copenhagen
description: Nice spacey apartment with ensuite livingrooms, where one can be turned into a bedroom with a fold out kingsize bed, should you need an ekstra bedroom. The apartment is centered in the middle of the cutest neighborhood, within walking distance to famous restaurants, parks, shoppingstreets and sightseeing spots.

name: Cosy apartment next to the lakes and the park!
description:
Cosy apartment next to the lakes and the park! Right in the city, 5 min away from the metro at Norreport, food courts at Israel square and city centre and urban Norrebro. Great spot for a couple to enjoy the city with easy access to most areas of Copenhagen.
NOTE - PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOUR PROFILE IS UPDATED AND VERIFIED VARIOUS WAYS AND HAS A DESCRIPTION OF WHO YOU ARE .
PLEASE STATE YOU ARRIVAL AND DEPARTURE TIME WHEN YOU MAKE YOUR REQUEST.

The space
80m2 bright and beautiful newly renovated, sleeps max 2 guests. Large dining/living room, bedroom, kitchen and bathroom. Kitchen is fully equipped, tea/coffee is included, all other stuff you can stock up on in near by shops.

Guest access
Access to whole apartment.

name: Super central flat by Nyhavn
description:
You dont get better location, in the exclusive heart of Copenhagen - just behind Nyhavn and the Royal Theatre. Just 3 min walk from Kongens Nytorv metro (15 min from Copenhagen Airport).

The flat is a 160m2 traditional, charming flat on the 3rd floor. There are 2 double rooms, dinning room, living room with television, wifi, toilet and bathroom. The kitchen is of an older style with eating area, fully equipped.

In the back courtyard, there is a playground

No rental to groups of young people

The space
This flat is a charming, rustic flat in the perfect location

name: Beautiful, roomy and centrally located apartment.
description:
Cozy and roomy apartment located in the heart of Copenhagen with a beautiful view over The Lakes (known as "S?erne" in Danish). From this central location in N?rrebro you can easily go to Vesterbro, ?sterbro, City Centre, Amager, Refshale?en - so basically it's in the middle of everything.

The apartment is 103 square meters, light and spacious. It features a cosy fire escape made into a balcony and on the other side of the apartment a view over The Lakes.

The space
There is a king size bed in the apartment, so the apartment is perfect for at couple or others who don't mind sleeping in a bed together.

There is a large equipped kitchen where you can cook your own food.

name: Apartment in the heart of Copenhagen
description:
The apartment is open, light and friendly and is situated on the third floor in an older historic building with great views towards a church campus surrounded by green space. Also included is free wireless network access. The apartment contains an attractive living room, foyer and one bedroom with two single beds. A complete kitchen with stove/oven, micro range and dining table. The bathroom is fully equipped and has shower stall. Smoking is not allowed in apartment or adjacent stairway.

Guest access
The whole apartment

name: Charming house with large green garden centralCPH.
description: Spacious house with high ceilings and lots of outdoor space. Private terrace and a huge green lawn shared with neighbors. Here you?ll find tranquility near the city center only short walking distance to both the Opera house, Noma, Nyhavn and the popular street food court ?Reffen? in the old ship yard.

name: Penthouse apartment in the heart of Copenhagen
description:
Penthouse apartment in the heart of Copenhagen. The apartment contains of one big room bathed in natural lights from both sides. It's fully equipped kitchen, a dining area for six people, a sitting area with a huge couch, a TV and a desk. From there you have access to the balcony where the afternoon sun hits. In the Master bedroom you'll find a 180x200 cm bed. The guest room is equipped with a queen size bed. The bathroom is large with Dornbracht fixtures and a Miele washer/dryer combi machine.

The space
The apartment is very light and airy. It's location is the best in Copenhagen with metro, water and parks nearby.

name: Unique and stylish centrally located townhouse.
description: A stylish and unique townhouse located in a quiet and friendly tree-lined neighbourhood (Composers Quarter) on the immediate outskirts of central copenhagen. Conveniantly located close to S-trains and Metro services (10 minutes to all major areas and attractions e.g. central Copenhagen, Bakken, the beach. 30 minutes to the airport). The property was renovated in 2021 and furnished with selection of midcentury danish design classics. Two sunnny outdoor courtyards. Crib and baby changing table.

name: [Luxury] Guldmagerens Hus Penthouse, Nyhavn 59
description:
Guldmagerens Hus is located in the new end of Nyhavn and it is named after the alchemist and coppersmith Henrik Ehm who tried to create gold in the 1700?s.
This apartment is for the people who expect luxury, fast travel, quality, and a great atmosphere!

The space
Copenhagen prides itself on having well preserved authentic apartments, and my apartment is one of those. Built-in the 1600s, my apartment allows guests to experience the beauty of authentic danish architecture. I?ve allowed myself to go ?all-in? in terms of interior design - choosing only the best of luxury furniture.

Guest access
The apartment is comprised of 3 bedrooms, each equipped with a double bed. I understand that having a really clear understanding of the home's configuration is a critical aspect of planning a trip as a group.
The apartment contains a large dining table, lighting, curtains, and all the essential amenities listed on the profile, such as a fully e

name: Central yet hidden apartment with private garden
description:
The absolute advantage of this apartment would have to be its perfect location. Directly off of Copenhagen's famous street of Nansensgade, full of local bars and restaurants for any taste (Lebanese, Italian, Danish, Japanese, Spanish etc.)! On the street parallel lies the entrance to H.C. ?rsted Park, which is a spectacularly well-kept green space perfect for taking an evening walk or just lounging out on the grass with friends.

The space
The apartment is cozy and an enjoyable home-base for your stay in Copenhagen. You will find all the basic amenities such as a kitchen which shares the space with the living room and a table for 4 on which to eat and gather round.

The bathroom is spacious, especially for Copenhagen, and character is something this apartment has in its own special way.

The private garden opens up the back of the building with picnic tables, chairs and a playground.

name: Cozy apartment in the city centre of Copenhagen
description:
Small apartment with one bedroom, a living room, kitchen and bathroom.

Within one kilometer to all main tourist attractions, historic buildings in CPH and just behind the shopping center of the city.

Cityring (metro), airport metro, trains and busses all within 1 kilometer at the various stations.

Located at an amazing street just behind Str?get of Copenhagen with lots of good vibes and caf‚'s.

Perfect for a romantic getaway.

Please do not hesitate to write me, if you have any questions:)

The space
One bedroom, living room, bathroom and kitchen with all the main supplies you will need, including dishwasher, oven, stove and fridge.

Free wifi.

Guest access
The entire apartment.

Other things to note
Not suitable for children.

Located at the 4th floor.

name: Bright studio apartment in the heart of Copenhagen
description:
This bright, cozy studio apartment is located in the heart of Copenhagen in an old historic building from the 1700th century. The studio is newly renovated with a modern touch, with respect for the old details.
Beautiful dining kitchen with Gaggenau gas stove, Miele combi oven and Quooker. Bathroom with shower.
Bright living/bedroom with TV, double bed for 2 guests (140x200), a fireplace, and Free WiFi. A vibrant neighborhood with lots of local caf‚s, restaurants, winebars & vintage shops.

The space
You can expect a clean, bright and stylish apartment and wonderful sightseeing opportunities.

Guest access
Guests will have the entire apartment for themselves

name: Spacious luxury apartment in inner city
description:
1. spacious bedroom. 30 .kvm. Access to full spa bathroom.
1 spacious bedoom . 30 kvm. Acces to full bathroom.
Both bathrooms located across the hallway (few steps from bedroom).
1 bedroom, 20 kvm., Sofabed sleeps two. Writing desk. TV
Fully equipped kitchen with American fridge. Ice machine and cool water.
50 kvm. stately dining room
View to Tivoli Gardens and Park.
Restaurants, major museums few minutes' walk away.

name: Cozy apartment in Copenhagen
description:
Cozy 2-room apartment, located in beautiful Valby not far from scenic areas. With only 6 minutes walk to Valby train station, you can easily get around. You can be at Copenhagen Central Station in just 7 minutes!

You'll get a bedroom with a large double bed as well as a living room with a TV and a sofa that can be folded out as a double bed (with a matching top mattress for comfort). In addition, you will find two balconies on both sides of the apartment, so there is sun all day.

The space
The apartment contains a bedroom with a balcony. There is also cupboard space here for your personal belongings. In addition, there is a spacious living room, with dining area, sofa and TV area and associated balcony. It is possible to fold out the sofa into a double bed. In the kitchen you will find a fridge, stove, crockery and everything a kitchen should contain. The bathroom contains a separate shower cubicle.

Guest access
There is access t

name: Super central, charming roof top view of Cph
description:
Topfloor charming home, perfectly and centrally situated in one of citys most charming and in friendly neighborhoods with cafes, parks, playgrounds and The Lakes. Easy transport - also from airport. An apartment with lots of space - two separate bedrooms with dobble beds, big livingroom w. room for madras on the floor if needed, sunny and bright, cousy kitchen w. acces to balcony, high chair for children available and also a trolley if needed.

The space
4. th floor in an old, but renewed apartment with lots of charm and personality in a house, where people know eachother and are used to guests from all over the world. We all live here, so please respect the peace and quietness for those, who have to get up in the morning - no parties, please.

name: Rent a Place
Stylish apartment in the heart of Copenhagen
description:
Welcome to my stylish apartment located in the City Center that can perfectly accommodate 2-4 people, right next to Nyhavn and Christiansborg.
- Perfect for a getaway to beautiful Copenhagen
- 3 minutes walk to the Hop on Hop off tourist boats and busses
- 5 minutes walk to the Metro (Kongens Nytorv) & Magasin du Nord
- 8 minutes walk to Nyhavn
- 10 minutes walk to Rosenborg Palace & Gardens
- 12 minutes walk to Tivoli Gardens
- 16 minutes Metro ride to the Airport (Lufthavn)

The space
THE LIVING ROOM & KITCHEN
- One common area for living room and kitchen, with dining area
