- Hard wood coffee table and black rug
- Wall mounted white TV Stand and tall book shelf
- LCD TV (with HDMI cable) and bluetooth speaker for entertainment
- Art pieces on the walls and vivid plants in pots
- Round table for 4 people with chairs
- Fully

name: Amazing studio apartment in the heart of Copehagen
description:
The space
My apartment is super cozy and right in the heart of inner Copenhagen. The apartment is bright and has a double bed and a single. It has a kitchen with a small refrigerator and freezer. A small stove and a microwave. This super cost apartment is perfect for guests that wants to stay right in the heart of Copenhagen. My apartment is placed in the back so you won?t be disturbed by the street noise.

name: Wonderful apartment in the centre of Copenhagen.
description: A perfect apartment for a family. Everything you need. 4 bedrooms. 2 living rooms  dining room and a big kitchen just 10 minutes walk from the city center.

name: newly renovated classic spacious apartment
description:
Beautiful spacious/305 m2 newly renovated apartment in the heart of historical center of Copenhagen
state of the art modern kitchen
5 min walk from Royal Palace and main shopping areas of Copenhagen
2 min walk from Danish Design Museum and Marble church as well as most prominent art galleries
5 min walk from subway system

name: Luxurious 2-bedroom newly renovated apartment
description: Luxurious 2-bedroom newly renovated apartment (110 sqm) in the center of Copenhagen. 4-minutes from the Centralstation, Townhall & The new Metro. 1 minute from the Copenhagen harbour. Spacious and cozy - large living room together with a functional cool kitchen. 2 large bedrooms with high-end beds. New designer bathroom. Cool apartment for a Copenhagen visit in the center, but a quit neighbourhood - just 4 minutes walking distance from EVERYTHING. A loft feel with a nice balcony.

name: Newly renovated central Copenhagen apartment
description: This traditional 2-room Copenhagen apartment incorporates natural light and boasts a prime central location. Right next to Nyhavn, Amalienborg, Christianshavn and the central shopping streets, this apartment is only a 5 min. walk to the nearest metro station. The interior design is classic minimalistic and the apartment is newly renovated with a washer-dryer as well as all new kitchen equipment and utensils. The apartment has an elevator, wifi, french balcony and loads of storage space.

name: City Center apartment in charming surroundings
description:
City Center apartment, 90 m2 with spacious rooms and balcony that has sunlight all day. Located in one of Copenhagen's most attractive streets, Nansensgade, this apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 nursery room, a hallway, toilet/bathroom, 1 living room and a large kitchen/dining area with access to lovely balcony with nice bench and table. The apartment is in walking distance from the Central Station, several bus/metro stops, child friendly areas, cool shops, amazing cafes, restaurants and bars.

The space
There is a nice large courtyard in addition to the apartment. Here it is possible to play petanque, have a dinner/lunch under the trees or play football or basket or just lay on the grass and enjoy the sun.
It is possible to do your laundry at our laundromat. There is three washing machines and two dryers. Laundry card is available on request.

name: Unique studio place in the middle of Copenhagen
description:
You get to spend the night in one of the very old buildings in the medieval town. In an 18th century apartment that I have designed as my studio. Right in the center of Copenhagen with everything within walking distance.

The studio contains two rooms, one room for ours you can enjoy, the other room with a bed, exit to "Tea kitchen", you can NOT cook, but make tea and coffee, cook without the use of hobs, but there is a refrigerator. But a real kitchen is not.

Wifi is currently not installed

The space
My studio has a "TEA KITCHEN", which means you can NOT cook by a stove or oven. You can boil water or make coffee - there is a fridge so you can shop if you want to make some light food. There are cutlery and plates etc.

There is a small toilet, with shower ... so nice

Two beautiful living rooms, rooms-one of which faces the street and views of the canal and beautiful old buildings. The second living room, rooms face a ve

name: Modern design & unique details, central 176sqm apt
description:
Family-friendly apartment next to the Royal Palace, many historic sights and prime shopping.

High ceilings, parquet flooring, wooden panels and old detailing mixed with bold colors and modern design items. Lots of character and light throughout the six rooms.

The spacious apartment features a master bedroom with a big, comfy bed, a large pull-out bed in the corner living room, and a children?s room with a bunk bed for kids.

The neighborhood is wonderful Frederiksstaden, close to the water.

The space
With large, open living rooms and a perfect location, we hope you?ll feel at home and use our space to enjoy and explore the city.

The apartment features a fully equipped kitchen with high-end cookware, knives and gadgets including a vitamix blender and coffee grinder.

We have purposely kept a lot of the older details that give charm to the place, like wooden cabinets and panels, and added a splash of bold color

name: Charming apartment located in the city center
description: Great, charming and light apartment located in the city center....

name: Bright and modern apartment - inner ?sterbro!
description:
Extremely attractive and quiet location, Inner ?sterbro.

The space
A beautiful, large and authentic 3 room apartment located in fashionable inner ?sterbro.

One large bedroom with a 140 cm bed + wardrobe and a working space.

A newly renovated bathroom with in-floor heating and a washing machine.

A very bright living room with a big coffee table, a 49" TV and a large and comfortable corner couch.

A large, bright and fully equipped kitchen-dining area with a big dining table.

A new, private and super nice balcony from the kitchen.

There is free wifi in the apartment.

I added some pictures of previous ratings as well. My sister handled the air-bnb back then.

name: Cozy apartment in the heart of Copenhagen
description:
This beautiful apartment is located in the heart of Copenhagen. It's absolutely perfect for tourists who wish to explore Copenhagen. If you wish to stay in, the apartment offers a cozy living room with balcony , fully equipped kitchen, nice restroom, and two small but adorable bedrooms, one including a balcony. If you wish to go out, the area is absolutely packed with caf‚s and restaurants.

The space
The apartment is 73 m2 and has two bedrooms, a kitchen, a bathroom and a large living room. The apartment has two balconies, where you can enjoy your morning coffee in the sun. The apartment has two TV's, one in the living room, where you can access Netflix free of charge. The other one is in the bedroom, where you can use "Chromecast" and cast from your phone. The wifi is free as well.
The kitchen is fully equipped and you are welcome to use everything, provided you keep it intact :)

Guest access
You will have acces to the entire apartme

name: Cozy Beautiful two-bedroom near Tivoli -5 min walk
description:
A contemporary apartment in the heart of Copenhagen's Latin Quarter. The apartment is a short walk to most of the big tourist attractions such as Tivoli Gardens and Str?get. You'll easily find cozy caf‚s and bars in the area, as well as a variety of stores to do your shopping in.
The residence features plank wood flooring, an open-concept living space and colorful artworks on the walls.
Please feel free to ask if you have any questions regarding the neighbourhoodq- i'd be happy to help.

The space
The apartment has two bedrooms with enough space for four people total. The rooms are connected to the living room that has a nice TV and a wide sofa. The kitchen features a large marble countertop suited to make homecooked meals. The bathroom has an amazing shower as well as a washing machine and a dryer.
The bedrooms are facing towards the courtyard, which guards from the noise of the city - so if don't worry if you're a light sleeper.

name: 160 m2 two stories apartment by the Round tower
description:
Newly build apartment in the middle of Copenhagen. Apartment has open kitchen/living room and dining room. 2 bedrooms are located on the second floor with toilet and shower. There are 2 balconies and a beautiful view of the round tower. You can?t live more central then this. 10 min walk to the queens palace, the opera, harbour and much more. Shopping is just outside your front door. Tv has 4 different streaming channels. Kitchen has everything you need.

The space
You have everything you need to enjoy a great stay in Copenhagen.

Other things to note
The apartment is all yours. You will receive a message with all the check in instructions prior to your arrival.

name: Lovely room close to the city center
description:
Our home is an international house of 3 roommates. We are young people that enjoy a cozy atmosphere.

The apartment is very close to the center of the oldest part of Copenhagen.


The room is all yours for your access, I have all of my belonging, therefore we base the hosting on mutual trust and respect.

PLEASE NOTE:
The kitchen is not for use. as there are other people living there and it?s just for personal comfort.

The space
You have a private balcony in the room. The best place to enjoy a coffee in privacy.

name: Danish lifestyle in premium location
description:
Enjoy a beautiful experience in an old Danish building right in the heart of the city. Newly renovated apartment in premium location, walking distance to most attractions and easy to get to from the Airport.
- Surrounded by exquisite restaurants, cafes, bars and live-music pubs
- Just 2 minutes walk from Gammeltorv and Str?get ?shopping street?
- 5 minutes walk to R†dhuspladsen and Tivoli Gardens
- 10 minutes walk from Christiansborg Slots and Copenhagen Canals

The space
Apartment has been freshly renovated and everything is brand new.
Step in the fully equipped kitchen with all appliances needed to ensure you can prepare yourself a great meal.
Further down the hallway you?ll find a tall wardrobe and clothes hanger.
The bedroom is well placed away from noise, window facing the small and quiet courtyard. Big bathroom with a walk-in shower area.
The living room is spacious and very bright thanks to the tall windows. You c

name: Superb location in the center of Copenhagen
description:
Superb location in the center of Copenhagen in a quiet street. 5 minuts from the city center (Str?get), Tivoli, main railway station/metro, National Museum, food markets and walking distance to Nyhavn (colored houses).

The apartment has two balcons, one with acces from the beedroom (with a double bed and a child bed 3-8 years old), and a children room (with a bunk- and a pull out bed.

There is tv with netflix and other local/int. canals and wifi.

(the fotos are old but the best we have now)

The space
There is a combined living room with kitchen and acces to a balcon.

Washing machine and tumble dryer.

Electricity will be charged separatly. (expect aprox. 100-200 kr.)

name: Citycentre apartment with private balcony
description:
My 3 bedroom apartment is located in the center of Copenhagen, 20 minutes from the airport by train or metro. It is located in a quiet area with cafes, shops, supermarkets, museums and green areas within two minutes walk. It is a 10 minute walk from two subway and train stations (N?rreport and ?sterport). From there you can catch the subway or train and get anywhere in Copenhagen in no time. You'll rent the whole apartment.

The space
The apartment has a big balcony with a view of the green backyard. Here you can enjoy dinner in the evening sun and watch the sun go down.

Guest access
You will have the whole apartment to yourself during your stay. And you'll have access to a large backyard with a small playground.

Other things to note
The price includes fresh bed linen & towels for the Double bed and Double duvet.

Washing machine and tumble dryer in the backyard. Each have a 40DKK fee. More info upon request.

name: 1st class | Best location
description:
Its newly renovated using quality materials and equipped with quality furniture and beds.

Located in the heart of Copenhagen with easy access to basicly everything you want to do/see while you?re here.

name: Modern luxury penthouse in the heart of Copenhagen
description:
Located just 1 minutes walk from N?rreport st, you'll find this newly renovated 114 m2 penthouse. Located in the most central place of Copenhagen you can visit all main attractions by walking distance. The airport is only a 10 minute metro ride away. The apartment is perfect for families, couples or friends who want to have a good time in Copenhagen.

We welcome anyone and ensure you'll have the best time visiting wonderful Copenhagen.

The space
Only 1 minutte walk from N?rreport Station will you find our beaituful 114 m2 new renovated apartment. Fiolstr‘de is one of the most central streets in Copenhagen and here you will be close to everything. The apartment has everything you need. Big living area with new fully eqiped kitchen, dining room and living room in one. Also the apartment has 2 beedrooms, wich includes 1 master bedroom on 40 m2. Last the apartment has big bathroom with all facilities you need. Furthermore, the building offers a shared terra

name: Supercentral well-equipped apartment
description:
Beautiful apartment in the epicenter of Copenhagen in a historical house next to shopping street Str?get, Amagertorv square and Christiansborg.
Gl. Strand metro station: 150 m.
N?rreport train station: 8 min walk.
The apartment is 60 m2 and fully equipped with all amenities.
One sleeping room with 140 cm double bed. Sofa bed (2 persons) in the living room and folding bed.
Ideal for two persons but may accomodate up to 4 persons.
Perfect base for exploring central Copenhagen.

name: Spacious apartment in the heart of Copenhagen
description:
Spacious apartment in the heart of Copenhagen. Walking distance to Nyhavn, Tivoli, Metro and everything else in the city center.
The apartment consists of an open kitchen and dining area with a large dining table. A living room with multiple couches and a TV.
The bedroom has a king sized bed that can be separated to twin beds if requested.
The bathroom is modern with a bathtub, toilet, sink and a mirror.

The space
The full length couch in the living room can be used to sleep on and will be prepared with sheets, pillow and comforter if requested. Air-mattresses can also be provided on request in order to accommodate a forth person.

Guest access
The whole apartment is available for use with exception of a private storage room.

name: 1st class || Best location
description: Its newly renovated using quality materials and equipped with quality furniture and beds. Located in the heart of Copenhagen with easy access to basicly everything you want to do/see while you?re here.

name: Charming apartment in the heart of Copenhagen
Dinesen Collection Signature Penthouse
description:
Enjoy Professional Cleaning & 5-star hotel linen.

A tour of the place

The elevator takes you straight to the 3rd floor where the main entrance is. A short staircase leeds you into the the open living kitchen and

description:
In a side street to Nyhavn is Toldbodgade where you find the apartment Brooklyn where you are located in the heart of Copenhagen. You'll have all the best restaurants and more right where you're located.

? BE AWARE THAT the price is really cheap compared to other hosts who demand more money for apartments in Nyhavn which aren't even located in Nyhavn.

More information can be found below!

The space
Copenhagen prides itself on having well preserved authentic apartments, and my apartment is one of those. description:

You'll have access solid fast WIFI, big bed, full kitchen and a large desk, if you're travelling for work. We also have a great self-check in system which allows you to check in even if you arrive in the middle of the night.

The space
The living room is a huge open multifunctional room, where one wall is a fully equipped modern kitchen, another has a large desk and then there is a very nice large sofa bed witch can be setup as a second bed on your request.

The bedroom has a really large comfy continental bed and a tv connected to an apple tv with Netflix, perfect for a lazy night in.

We have rented out these two rooms separately in the passed and we used to rent out just the bed

description:
We are located in the heart of Copenhagen's historic city center, come and enjoy our fun, cozy, and hip Scandinavian atmosphere. Copenhagen Downtown Hostel is located in one of Copenhagen's coolest artistic areas. We are within a ten-minute walk from Central Station and all the major sights with shopping, bars, and restaurants around the corner. We offer great value accommodation for everyone. You can choose between private rooms, family rooms and shared dorm rooms.

The space
In case you prefer to be accommodated in a quieter room please send an email and if available you will be assigned to one.
Age restriction: Guests must be over 18 to stay in the shared dormitories. All persons under the age of 18 can stay only in private rooms with adult guardians.

Nordic well-being in premium location

Bright, spacious and beautifully furnished apartment in the very city centre, within walking distance to Str?get, Tivoli Gardens and most of the city attractions. Suitable for up to six people, the apartment is beautifully furnished and features all needed amenities for a perfect stay.

- newly renovated and beautifully spaced. One bedroom is upstairs and one downstairs

- located in a historical building with a lot of character

Other things to note
LOCATION & NOISE
- Please note the apartment is very central, therefore the street is noisy at night, especially more in weekends. There are a few terraces and bars right outside the building that can be noisy. We recommend to bring earplugs if you are sensitive to noise.

Other things to note
It's a quiet residential neighborhood and it should be respected so no noise please. And the backyard should not be used after 10pm and the sound level should be kept down during the day. Babies usually not accepted, but feel free to ask, and there will be the usual extra fee as for other persons.

The house

The space

name: 140sqm apartment from 2022 - 3 bedrooms / 2baths.
description:
Brand new luxery apartment from 2022 at Islands Brygge. Three big bedrooms and 2 big bathrooms and a sunny balcony. The apartment is located on the 3rd floor but there is an elevator. All the funitures/beds etc. are from 2022 in nice nordic style and design.

Fully equipped kitchen with every thing you need for cooking. High-Speed WIFI and a brand new 55" QLED TV.

The apartment is perfect for up to 6 people and you can't beat the location. Close to the city, metro, the water, super market.

The space
Overview of the apartment:

Bedroom 1: 1 double bed (160cm x 200)
Bedroom 2: 2 Single beds
Bedroom 3: 1 double bed (160cm x 200)
2 x bathrooms with shower/WC
Open kitchen/living room with sunny balcony + big sofa + dinning table.
High Speed WI-FI
Elevator

Dishwasher, dryer, washing machine, microwave. TV where you can use your own Netflix login.
